title: The Second Inspector Morse Omnibus: The Secret Of Annexe 3 / The Riddle Of Third Mile / Last Seen Wearing
description: Contains three full-length novels: "The Secret of Annexe 3" which concerns a murder at the New Year celebrations at the Haworth Hotel; "The Riddle of the Third Mile" which is about the disappearance of Dr Browne-Smith; and "Last Seen Wearing" in which new evidence opens a case over two years old.
author: Colin Dexter
